original_title: Έκτορας Μαλό: Η τελευταία μέρα της χρονιάς
overview: New Year’s Eve dawns in a moon-kissed car, and Sofia has a dream that she tells no-one: while walking on a desert, she gets to know that she is sick. She pretends she does not care. Has she lost heart?
title: Hector Malot: The Last Day of the Year
